revision.text: '''Battle Items''' are common items used throughout gameplay to buff various attributes of the game for a limited time. ==Acquisition== Items can be gained through purchase at [[shops]] or by opening chests in [[dungeons]]. ==List of Battle Items== {| class="wikitable" ! ! Name |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} | [[X Attack]] |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} | [[X Click]] |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} | [[Lucky Egg]] |- | {{Bag3|Token Collector}} | [[Token Collector]] |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} | [[Item Magnet]] |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} | [[Lucky Incense]] |} {{Battle items}}
revision.comment: Protected "[[Battle Items]]": Protecting the whole wiki lets go ([Edit=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite) [Move=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite) [Delete=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite) [Protect=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite))
